name: NSFetchedResultsController
desc: A controller that you use to  manage the results of a Core Data fetch request and to display data to the user.

items.name: init(fetchRequest: NSFetchRequest<ResultType>, managedObjectContext: NSManagedObjectContext, sectionNameKeyPath: String?, cacheName: String?)
items.desc: Returns a fetch request controller initialized using the given arguments.

items.name: var fetchRequest: NSFetchRequest<ResultType>
items.desc: The fetch request used to do the fetching.

items.name: var managedObjectContext: NSManagedObjectContext
items.desc: The managed object context used to fetch objects.

items.name: var sectionNameKeyPath: String?
items.desc: The key path of the attribute that determines which section the fetched entity belongs to.

items.name: var cacheName: String?
items.desc: The name of the file used to cache section information.

items.name: var delegate: NSFetchedResultsControllerDelegate?
items.desc: The object that is notified when the fetched results changed.

items.name: class func deleteCache(withName: String?)
items.desc: Deletes the cached section information with the given name.

items.name: func object(at: IndexPath) -> ResultType
items.desc: Returns the object at the given index path in the fetch results.

items.name: func indexPath(forObject: ResultType) -> IndexPath?
items.desc: Returns the index path of a given object.

items.name: var sections: [NSFetchedResultsSectionInfo]?
items.desc: The sections for the fetch results.

items.name: func section(forSectionIndexTitle: String, at: Int) -> Int
items.desc: Returns the section number for a given section title and index in the section index.

items.name: func sectionIndexTitle(forSectionName: String) -> String?
items.desc: Returns the corresponding section index entry for a given section name.

items.name: var sectionIndexTitles: [String]
items.desc: The array of section index titles.

items.name: protocol NSFetchedResultsControllerDelegate
items.desc: A delegate protocol that describes the methods that will be called by the associated fetched results controller when the fetch results have changed.

items.name: protocol NSFetchedResultsSectionInfo
items.desc: A protocol that defines the interface for section objects vended by a fetched results controller.

items.name: struct NSFetchRequestResultType
items.desc: Constants that specify the possible result types a fetch request can return.

items.name: enum NSFetchedResultsChangeType
items.desc: Constants that specify the possible types of changes that are reported.

declaration: class NSFetchedResultsController<ResultType> : NSObject where ResultType : NSFetchRequestResult
